fields.headline: Leicester v Wolves: match preview
fields.bodyText: This is an intriguing game between two attacking sides who cancelled each other out last season, when they shared a pair of scoreless draws. Both Leicester and Wolves have evolved since then and found new ways to infiltrate opponents so, although they remain defensively strong, goals seem likely now. Leicester have the added incentive of knowing that victory would send them top, at least for a few hours. Paul Doyle Sunday 2pm Sky Sports Premier League Venue King Power Stadium Last season Leicester 0 Wolves 0 Odds H 5-4 A 12-5 D 2-1 Referee Anthony Taylor This season G5 Y14 R1 3 cards/game LEICESTER Subs from Ward, Jakupovic, Morgan, Albrighton, Choudhury, Under, Barnes, Iheanacho, Pérez, Gray Doubtful None Injured Castagne (hamstring, 21 Nov), Pereira (knee, 21 Nov), Ndidi (hip, unknown), Amartey (hamstring, unknown), Soyuncu (hip, unknown) Suspended None Discipline Y17 R0 Form WWLLWW Leading scorer Vardy 7 WOLVES Subs from Ruddy, Aït-Nouri, Hoever, Kilman, Moutinho, Traoré, Silva, Otasowie, Buur, Vitinha Doubtful None Injured Jonny (knee, unknown) Suspended None Discipline Y4 R0 Form LLWWDW Leading scorer Jiménez 4
